original_text: Then the Lord said to Noah, ‘Go into the ship. Take your wife and family with you. I can see that you alone do what is right, among all the people on the earth.
korean_text: 여호와께서 노아에게 이르시되 너와 네 온 집은 방주로 들어가라 이 세대에서 네가 내 앞에 의로움을 내가 보았음이니라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to Noah
Take your wife and family with you
I can see that you alone do what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 혼자 옳은 일을 하는 것을 내가 본다

sentences.original_text: among all the people on the earth
